results.title: January inflation, Fed's Powell testifies, top earnings: ICYMI
creator: Yahoo Finance Video
results.description: It's been a whirlwind week for Wall Street. Here's a brief recap in case you missed any of the big headlines. Investors digest January's hotter-than-expected inflation data from the latest Consumer Price Index (CPI) print. Learn more here: There's a 25% chance Fed could hike rates in 2025: Economist Disinflation trends may be 'coming to an end': Moody's Zandi Americans have been in 'inflation hell.' Will tariffs make it worse? Rate hikes could put Fed on 'collision course' with Trump The four policy 'guardrails' Trump needs to follow Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell testified before US lawmakers on Capitol Hill as part of his semi-annual economic report. Learn more here: January CPI: One inflation print won't 'alter the path' for Fed Lowering interest rates would be 'right thing to do': Sen. Warren Yahoo Finance heard from a wide array of CEOs and C-suite leaders this week following their companies' latest earnings report. Learn more here: Lyft CEO says he's 'not worried' about Uber price war Autonomous vehicles will be a 'must-have,' Lyft CEO says Coca-Cola CFO says Trump's aluminum tariffs are manageable DraftKings CEO outlines strong 2025 forecast, Super Bowl bets For more expert insight and the latest market action, click here. This post was written by Luke Carberry Mogan.
